column4: ok NOW I'm mad.... I installed both qt3-designer and glade.... I know *ONE* of them had the option for outputting in perl.... neither seem to tho.... what gives? help! beg! plead! whine!
:q!  ... if he doesnt know how to get out, he probably didnt know how to edit the file either, best not to write :P
ps ax and "kill -9 <pid>" for what is frozen.
